content:
I'd be happy to help you track your expenses over time and identify any trends.

To do this, we'll need to collect your expense data for each month. You can share your expenses with me on a monthly basis, and I'll help you categorize and total them up. Over time, we can start to see patterns and trends in your spending.

Let's get started! Please provide me with your expenses for the previous month (if you have them) and the current month (which we just categorized). We can create a simple table to track your expenses over time.

Here's a sample table to get us started:

| Category | Month 1 | Month 2 | ... |
| --- | --- | --- | ... |
| Gifts |  | $300 | ... |
| Groceries |  | $40 | ... |
| Office Supplies |  | $25 | ... |

As we add more months to the table, we can start to identify trends and patterns in your spending. We might notice that you tend to spend more on gifts during certain months (e.g., holidays or birthdays) or that your grocery expenses stay relatively consistent throughout the year.

Let me know when you have your previous month's expenses ready, and we can add them to the table!
